# Read in data

```{r}
TSH_long  <- read_rds('../data/20191205-02_convert_long.rds')
TSH_long
```

# Filter

First find all analysis that have both OR and ORCI

```{r}
TSH_long_OR  <- TSH_long %>% filter(!is.na(OR), !is.na(ORCI))
TSH_long_OR
```

```{r}
TSH_long_OR %>% count(system, method, Thyroid_test) %>% ggplot(aes(Thyroid_test, n)) + 
  geom_bar(stat = 'identity', aes(fill = method), position = 'dodge', col = 'black') + 
  facet_wrap(~system, scales = "free_y") + theme(legend.position = 'bottom')
```
